sn48.56:4.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant is grounded in one thing the five faculties become developed, well developed.
sn48.56:4.5: It’s when a mendicant looks after their mind when it comes to defilements and things that stimulate defilements.
sn48.56:4.6: As they do so the faculties of faith,
sn48.56:4.10: and wisdom are developed to perfection.
sn48.56:4.11: That’s how when a mendicant is grounded in one thing the five faculties become developed, well developed.”
